StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NextGen Consortium: The iPSCORE (iPSC Collection for Omic Research) Resource

Person.Organization: SCRIPPS RESEARCH INSTITUTEUNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA SAN DIEGO
SCRIPPS RESEARCH INSTITUTEUNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA SAN DIEGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This work was supported in part by a California Institute for Regenerative Medicine (CIRM) grant GC1R-06673 and NIH grants EY021237, HG008118, HL107442, DK105541 and DK112155. iPSC RNA-seq was performed at the UCSD IGM Genomics Center with support from NIH grant P30 CA023100.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There are three consent groups associated with the iPSCORE dataset: 1) General Research Use (GRU); 2) Disease-Specific [Cardiomyopathy], Methods (DS-CMP-MDS) - Use of the data must be related to Cardiomyopathy. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms); and 3) Disease-Specific [Cardiomyopathy and Mitochondrial Disease], Methods (DS-CMP-MD-MDS) - Use of the data must be related to Cardiomyopathy and Mitochondrial Disease. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cardiomyopathy, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CMP-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cardiomyopathy. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cardiomyopathy and Mitochondrial Disease, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CMP-MD-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cardiomyopathy and Mitochondrial Disease. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).
